trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback"></xref> event, which occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback"></xref>拖曳作業期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event occurs during a drag operation.
It allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的拖曳事件來源。

trans-unit.source: A GiveFeedbackEventArgs object specifies the type of drag-and-drop operation and whether default cursors are used.
trans-unit.target: GiveFeedbackEventArgs 物件指定拖放作業，以及是否使用預設資料指標的類型。

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are obtained by applying the bitwise OR (|) operation to the constants defined in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值會套用，以獲得位元或常數 (|) 作業中定義<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if default pointers are used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用預設的指標。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得要顯示的拖放作業回應。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定拖曳作業是否應該使用與拖放效果關聯的預設游標。

trans-unit.source: The system provides default drag-drop cursors for different drag-drop operations such as move or copy.
trans-unit.target: 系統會提供不同的拖放作業，例如移動或複製拖放資料指標預設值。

trans-unit.source: If UseDefaultCursors is set to `false`, it is the responsibility of the event source to set the appropriate cursor.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 UseDefaultCursors `false`，它是要設定適當的資料指標的事件來源的責任。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default pointers are used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用預設指標;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
